== Can I change my username? ==

Most of our services use an email address instead of a username.
However, Launchpad uses a username.

To change your Launchpad username:

# Go to https://launchpad.net/
# Click your username in the upper-right corner.
# Click "Change details" in the menu on the right.
# Change your Name and/or Display Name as you like.
# Click "Save Changes" at the bottom of the page.
